faq_page.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq_page.payment_q: What payment methods do you accept?
faq_page.payment_a: We accept a wide variety of payment methods, including credit and debit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and other digital payment platforms. All transactions are 100% secure.
faq_page.shipping_q: How long does it take for my order to arrive?
faq_page.shipping_a: Standard delivery time is 3-5 business days. We also offer express shipping (1-2 business days) for an additional cost.
faq_page.returns_a: We offer a 30-day return policy. If you are not satisfied, you can return it for a full refund or exchange. The product must be in its original condition.
faq_page.account_q: Do I need an account to make a purchase?
faq_page.account_a: No, you can check out as a guest. However, an account offers advantages like a faster checkout process and access to your order history.
faq_page.international_a: We are currently focused on the domestic market, but we plan to expand. Subscribe to our newsletter to be the first to know!
faq_page.damaged_q: My product arrived damaged, what should I do?
faq_page.damaged_a: We are sorry to hear that. Please contact customer support with your order number and photos of the damaged product so we can assist you.

shipping_policy.title: Shipping and Returns
shipping_policy.subtitle: Everything you need to know about how we get our products to your door.

standard.title: Standard Domestic Shipping
standard.description: Our standard shipping is free for all orders over $50. For smaller orders, there is a flat rate of $5.
standard.tracking: All packages are sent with a tracking number that you will receive by email as soon as the order is dispatched.

express.title: Express Shipping
express.description: Need your order urgently? We offer an express shipping service for an additional cost of $15.

conditions.title: Timeframe and Conditions
conditions.description: We accept returns up to 30 days after the delivery date. For a return to be accepted, the product must be in its original packaging, unused, and in the same condition you received it.
conditions.exceptions: Software products and gift cards are non-returnable.

process.title: Return Process
process.description: To initiate a 'return', please contact our support team through the contact page with your order number. We will provide you with instructions and the shipping address.
process.shipping_costs: Return shipping costs are the responsibility of the customer, unless the reason for the return is an error on our part (incorrect or defective product).

general_rules.title: General Rules
general_rules.description: We reserve the right to refuse any return that does not meet the above criteria. It is important to inspect your order as soon as you receive it. If you find any issues, please contact us immediately.

contact_page.title: Contact Us
contact_page.form_intro: Have a question or need help? Fill out the form and our team will get back to you as soon as possible.
